name: Carnival Madness
description:
Carnival Madness is a roguelike puzzle game set in a cursed carnival. 

You are trapped in a cursed carnival that is siphoning your soul and the only means of escape is through navigating a maze of portals. However, the portals first need to be unlocked with combinations of items that are obtained through trades. Your progress is tracked and assembled in an archive menu.

This was a fun experimental project and is our first game made together.

Any feedback would be appreciated :)

  

Contributors

Gary Mooney: Lead, Art, Developer, Design
Jordan Atwill: Music, Developer, Design
Francis De Luca: General systems management, Developer, Design
